fields.name: DisableProbe
fields.description: Indicate whether the probe is disabled.

fields.name: FailureThreshold
fields.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded. Minimum value is 1.

fields.name: InitialDelaySeconds
fields.description: Number of seconds after the App Instance has started before probes are initiated. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle#container-probes

fields.name: PeriodSeconds
fields.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the probe. Minimum value is 1.

fields.name: SuccessThreshold
fields.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered successful after having failed. Must be 1 for liveness and startup. Minimum value is 1.

fields.name: TimeoutSeconds
fields.description: Number of seconds after which the probe times out. Minimum value is 1.
